channel.title: Mod and Admin crowns
channel.description:
Alright I hope I am posting this in right section...
Regardless okay so I am trying to change my Mod and Admin crowns with the program called Cache Editor.
When I upload the normal crowns into the archive of changing the sprites this happens..
[IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/261/110620003831.png[/img]
I don't understand why it wont come transparent or just rather match the background of the chatbox.
Maybe someone could help?

item.title: Mod and Admin crowns
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

yes its png and ive also opened it in photoshop and transperent but still does not work

Read full topic

item.title: Mod and Admin crowns
item.dc:creator: @veteran_god_king_ces veteran god: king cesar
item.description:
@veteran_god_king_ces wrote:

what file type is the image you put into the sprites? Needs to be .png

Read full topic

item.title: Mod and Admin crowns
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:3, topic:400070”]Bump: Please Help

Guy above me that didn’t work either it just has a magenta background now[/quote]

Then open it up with something other than paint, change the background to transparent, save.

Read full topic
